title: Image Classification with ANN
description: Birds inspired us to fly, nature inspired us to countless inventions. It seems logical, then to look at the brain’s architecture for inspiration on how to build an Intelligent Machine. This is the logic that sparked Artificial Neural Networks (ANN). ANN is a Machine Learning Model inspired by the networks of biological neurons found in our brains. However, although planes were inspired by birds, they don’t have to flap their wings. Similarly, ANN have gradually become quite different from their biological cousins. In this Article, I will build an Image Classification model with ANN to show you how ANN works.
